text: A chaordic organization refers to a system of organization that blends characteristics of chaos and order. The term was coined by Dee Hock, the founder and former CEO of the VISA credit card association. The mix of chaos and order is often described as a harmonious coexistence displaying characteristics of both, with neither chaotic nor ordered behavior dominating. The chaordic principles have also been used as guidelines for creating human organizations -- business, nonprofit, government and hybrids—that would be neither centralized nor anarchical networks. == See also == * Holacracy * Taoism ==References== * Dee Hock, Birth of the Chaordic Age () * Dee Hock, The Chaordic Organization: Out of Control and Into Order ==External links== * Chaordic Commons facilitate access to knowledge about chaordic organizations and organizing. * Simudyne a chaordic organisation. * Chaordic Mind: chaotic and ordered community catalysts Category:Types of organization Category:Taoism Category:Political concepts
